name: Idle hero: masters battles
description:
Free all your friends from captivity, in mini RPG game, study and improve the characteristics of warriors, defeat all warriors of Chaos.

- = Game Features = -

* tower defense mode

* single player Idle Clicker game

* 8 warriors, 5 characteristics, 4 unique characteristics, many combinations to improve

* 15 warriors of Chaos with a boss

* 8 locations for battles
